actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 161 of the Vocational Education Act of 1963, to utilize a portion of the funds for homemaking and consumer education programs to assist the elderly.
short_title: Homemaking Services for the Elderly Act

summary.text: Homemaking Services for the Elderly Act - Specifies that at least one-third of the Federal funds made available for consumer and homemaking education programs under the Vocational Educational Act of 1963 shall be used for special programs for the elderly. (Adds 20 U.S.C. 1341(d)(2))

titles.title: Homemaking Services for the Elderly Act
A bill to amend section 161 of the Vocational Education Act of 1963, to utilize a portion of the funds for homemaking and consumer education programs to assist the elderly.
